en: They are sensible girls.
zh: 她们是懂事的女孩。

en: How beautiful you are!
zh: 你真漂亮！

en: It's easier to have fun than to work.
zh: 玩比工作容易。

en: You must work more.
zh: 你必须多工作。

en: It's more difficult than you think.
zh: 这比你想象的更难。

en: I don't agree with him.
zh: 我不同意他的观点。

en: The spirit is willing, but the flesh is weak.
zh: 心有余而力不足。

en: There's quite a lot of things to do; do you want some help?
zh: 有很多事情要做；你需要帮忙吗？

en: He learned the news while reading the newspaper.
zh: 他看报纸时得知了这个消息。

en: I don't know if I'll have time to do it.
zh: 我不知道我是否有时间做这件事。

en: In a town you may pass unnoticed, whereas in a village it's impossible.
zh: 在城镇里你可能会不被人注意，但在村庄里这是不可能的。

en: When I was a child, I would spend hours reading alone in my room.
zh: 当我还是个孩子的时候，我会在我的房间里独自阅读几个小时。

en: Wolves won't usually attack people.
zh: 狼通常不会攻击人。

en: "Can somebody help me?" "I will."
zh: “有人能帮帮我吗？”“我来。”

en: Please will you close the door when you go out.
zh: 请你出去的时候关上门。

en: You've given me your cold.
zh: 你把你的感冒传染给我了。

en: Ah! If I were rich, I'd buy myself a house in Spain.
zh: 啊！如果我有钱，我就在西班牙买一栋房子。

en: Her garden is a work of art.
zh: 她的花园是一件艺术品。

en: I'd rather be a bird than a fish.
zh: 我宁愿做一只鸟，也不愿做一条鱼。

en: I have to sleep.
zh: 我必须睡觉了。

en: What are you doing?
zh: 你在做什么？

en: What're you doing?
zh: 你在做什么？

en: Happy birthday, Muiriel!
zh: 生日快乐，缪里尔！

en: Muiriel has turned twenty.
zh: 缪里尔二十岁了。

en: I'll be back soon.
zh: 我很快就会回来。

en: The students assembled in the classroom.
zh: 学生们在教室里集合。

en: The students turned in their term papers.
zh: 学生们交了他们的学期论文。

en: Each of the students has to attend the morning.
zh: 每个学生都必须参加早会。

en: Students are impatient for the summer holidays to come.
zh: 学生们迫不及待地等待暑假的到来。

en: The students discussed the plan for many hours.
zh: 学生们讨论这个计划好几个小时。

en: Each of the students has his own shoes.
zh: 每个学生都有自己的鞋子。

en: Each of the students has his own locker.
zh: 每个学生都有自己的储物柜。

en: The students were all looking forward to the summer vacation.
zh: 学生们都盼望着暑假。

en: Some of the students went by bus, and others on foot.
zh: 一些学生乘公共汽车去，另一些学生步行去。

en: The students met here to hear the speech.
zh: 学生们在这里见面听演讲。

en: Students often find it very difficult to understand a lecture in a foreign language.
zh: 学生们常常觉得很难听懂外语讲座。

en: The students have taken no notice of these instructions.
zh: 学生们没有注意到这些指示。

en: The students learned this poem by heart.
zh: 学生们用心记住了这首诗。

en: The students performed Hamlet.
zh: 学生们表演了《哈姆雷特》。

en: The students were required to learn the Constitution by heart.
zh: 学生们被要求用心记住宪法。

en: Students took the lead in the campaign against pollution.
zh: 学生们带头开展了反对污染的运动。

en: There were hardly any teachers at the school that students could talk to.
zh: 学校里几乎没有老师可以和学生交谈。

en: The student center is a good place to strike up conversations.
zh: 学生中心是开始交谈的好地方。

en: I'll bet he'd have a fit if his students fell asleep.
zh: 我敢打赌，如果他的学生睡着了，他会大发雷霆。

en: It is taken for granted that students know how to express themselves.
zh: 学生们知道如何表达自己是理所当然的。

en: A student visited the house of the great playwright.
zh: 一位学生拜访了那位伟大剧作家的家。

en: A student wants to see you.
zh: 有个学生想见你。

en: Three students. Here's my student ID.
zh: 三个学生。这是我的学生证。

en: I am tired of eating at the school cafeteria.
zh: 我厌倦了在学校食堂吃饭。

en: You should avail yourself of every opportunity to learn.
zh: 你应该利用一切机会学习。

en: No news is good news.
zh: 没有消息就是好消息。

en: I was expecting it!
zh: 我早就料到了！

en: Wait in the waiting room.
zh: 请在等候室等候。

en: I didn't know he drank so much.
zh: 我不知道他喝这么多。

en: Do you want fruit juice?
zh: 你要喝果汁吗？

en: He's a good person.
zh: 他是个好人。

en: Enjoy your meal!
zh: 请慢用！

en: There's no love without jealousy.
zh: 没有嫉妒就没有爱。

en: We are cut from the same cloth.
zh: 我们是一路人。

en: The walls have ears.
zh: 隔墙有耳。

en: Make yourself at home.
zh: 请随意。

en: Don't listen to him, he's talking nonsense.
zh: 别听他的，他在胡说八道。

en: I don't want it anymore.
zh: 我不要了。

en: He came several times.
zh: 他来了好几次。

en: We must think about friends.
zh: 我们应该多想想朋友。

en: I'm going to take a bath.
zh: 我要去洗个澡。

en: We left by train.
zh: 我们坐火车走了。

en: If you eat too much, you'll become fat.
zh: 如果你吃太多，你会变胖的。

en: Would you like to come?
zh: 你想来吗？

en: I thought it was true.
zh: 我以为是真的。

en: This is the town I told you about.
zh: 这就是我跟你说过的那个镇子。

en: I have to give back the book before Saturday.
zh: 我必须在星期六之前还书。

en: Hi, I just wanted to let you know that the problem is fixed.
zh: 嗨，我只是想告诉你问题已经解决了。

en: How can you have a laptop and not a cell phone?
zh: 你怎么会有笔记本电脑却没有手机呢？

en: I went to drink a beer with friends.
zh: 我和朋友去喝了杯啤酒。

en: She doesn't want to talk about it.
zh: 她不想谈论这件事。

en: I lost my inspiration.
zh: 我失去了灵感。

en: Be patient please. It takes time.
zh: 请耐心一点。这需要时间。

en: Close the door when you leave.
zh: 你离开的时候请关上门。

en: This is such a sad story.
zh: 这真是一个悲伤的故事。

en: My little brother is watching TV.
zh: 我的弟弟正在看电视。

en: Denying she was an anarchist, Katja maintained she wished only to make changes in our government, not to destroy it.
zh: 卡佳否认自己是无政府主义者，她坚持说她只想改变我们的政府，而不是摧毁它。

en: You met him at the university?
zh: 你在大学里见过他？

en: Aaah!! My computer is broken!
zh: 啊！！我的电脑坏了！

en: Yes, it happens from time to time.
zh: 是的，这种情况时有发生。

en: People in the world are always advocating for more freedom and equality.
zh: 世界上的人们总是在倡导更多的自由和平等。

en: He was sick of being vilified all the time by people who were jealous of his ability.
zh: 他厌倦了总是被那些嫉妒他能力的人诽谤。

en: Even people who don't believe in the Catholic church venerate the Pope as a symbolic leader.
zh: 即使是不相信天主教会的人也尊敬教皇，把他当作一个象征性的领袖。

en: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.
zh: 当飞机即将遇到气流时，飞行员要求飞机上的乘客系好安全带。

en: Jason was a taciturn individual, so it was always a real surprise when he said anything.
zh: 杰森是一个沉默寡言的人，所以当他说任何话的时候，总是让人感到非常惊讶。

en: The king was tired of his sycophants always praising him, so he sent them away.
zh: 国王厌倦了他的马屁精总是赞美他，所以他把他们赶走了。

en: Spenser would not tell anyone his surreptitious plan to get back at his friends for pranking him.
zh: 斯宾塞不会告诉任何人他偷偷摸摸的计划，要报复他的朋友们恶作剧。

en: If Spenser doesn't keep adding and translating sentences, the other contributors will surely surpass him.
zh: 如果斯宾塞不继续添加和翻译句子，其他的贡献者肯定会超过他。

en: His essay gave only a superficial analysis of the problem, so it was a real surprise to him when he got the highest grade in the class.
zh: 他的文章只是对这个问题进行了肤浅的分析，所以当他得到班里最高的成绩时，他感到非常惊讶。

en: Food and drink were served in such profusion at the wedding that the bride and groom began to wonder if they should not have invited more guests.
zh: 婚礼上提供的食物和饮料如此之多，以至于新娘和新郎开始怀疑他们是否应该邀请更多的客人。

en: The principal severely reproved the students whenever they made a mess in the hallway.
zh: 每当学生们把走廊弄脏时，校长都会严厉地斥责他们。

en: What criterion did you use when you elected this essay as the winner?
zh: 你选择这篇文章作为获胜者时使用了什么标准？

en: I like my job very much.
zh: 我非常喜欢我的工作。

en: The murderer was convicted and sentenced to life in prison.
zh: 凶手被判有罪并被判处终身监禁。

en: It was a surprise to see all the students behaving with decorum on prom night.
zh: 在毕业舞会上看到所有的学生都举止得体，这真是一个惊喜。

en: Whose is the book on the desk?
zh: 桌子上的书是谁的？

en: Not every book on the desk belongs to me.
zh: 不是桌子上所有的书都是我的。

en: The hat on the desk is Chama's.
zh: 桌子上的帽子是查玛的。

en: He noticed a letter on the desk.
zh: 他注意到桌子上有一封信。

en: The dictionary on the desk is mine.
zh: 桌子上的字典是我的。

en: The radio on the desk is a Sony.
zh: 桌子上的收音机是索尼的。

en: The lamp on the desk had an out-of-kilter lampshade.
zh: 桌子上的台灯的灯罩歪了。

en: The money on the desk is not mine.
zh: 桌子上的钱不是我的。

en: A book is lying on the desk.
zh: 桌子上放着一本书。

en: I see a book on the desk.
zh: 我看到桌子上有一本书。

en: There is a book on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一本书。

en: There is a book on dancing on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一本关于跳舞的书。

en: There is a map on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一张地图。

en: There is a fan on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一把风扇。

en: There are some books on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一些书。

en: There is a key on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一把钥匙。

en: I see a flower on the desk.
zh: 我看到桌子上有一朵花。

en: What is on the desk?
zh: 桌子上有什么？

en: There is an album on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一本相册。

en: There is a card on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一张卡片。

en: There is a dictionary on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一本字典。

en: Was there a book on the desk?
zh: 桌子上曾经有一本书吗？

en: There is an apple on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一个苹果。

en: There is one apple on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一个苹果。

en: Are there any pens on the desk?
zh: 桌子上有笔吗？

en: I seize the moment and turn it to my advantage.
zh: 我抓住机会，并把它转化为我的优势。

en: Don't throw away your chance.
zh: 不要放弃你的机会。

en: You must take advantage of the opportunity.
zh: 你必须抓住机会。

en: One should always make the most of one's opportunities.
zh: 人应该总是充分利用机会。

en: Thanks to the opportunity, we were able to avoid substantial effort.
zh: 多亏了这个机会，我们才得以避免大量的努力。

en: I'll speak to him at the first opportunity.
zh: 我会一有机会就和他谈谈。

en: A family should not spend all of its money to keep someone alive on a machine.
zh: 一个家庭不应该花光所有的钱来维持一个靠机器维持生命的人。

en: Chance is a nickname for Providence.
zh: 机遇是天意的别名。

en: You should see this film if you get the opportunity.
zh: 如果你有机会，你应该看看这部电影。

en: You should change your job if the occasion arises.
zh: 如果时机成熟，你应该换工作。

en: I will see him at the first opportunity.
zh: 我会一有机会就见他。

en: I will do it at the first opportunity.
zh: 我会一有机会就做这件事。

en: It's a pity we didn't visit Tom when we had the chance.
zh: 很遗憾我们没有在有机会的时候拜访汤姆。

en: The plane rose sharply before leveling off as it left the coast.
zh: 飞机在离开海岸时急剧上升，然后才趋于平稳。

en: When the time is ripe, be bold and go for it! I'll stand by you.
zh: 当时机成熟时，大胆地去做吧！我会支持你的。

en: There were two abstentions.
zh: 有两票弃权。

en: I was busy with work for the term exam.
zh: 我期中考试期间一直忙于工作。

en: The results of the term examination were anything but satisfactory.
zh: 期中考试的结果一点都不令人满意。

en: I have to give myself up to studying for final exams.
zh: 我不得不全身心投入到期末考试的复习中。

en: I've really got to buckle down and study for our final exams.
zh: 我真的要认真努力地复习期末考试了。

en: I'm busy because the finals are drawing on.
zh: 我因为期末考试临近而忙碌。

en: Submit your term papers to Professor White.
zh: 把你们的期末论文交给怀特教授。

en: How is your term paper coming along?
zh: 你的期末论文进展如何？

en: He passed the test as was expected.
zh: 他通过了考试，正如预期的那样。

en: As had been expected, the weather turned out to be very fine.
zh: 正如预期的那样，天气变得非常好。

en: On the whole, my company is doing well now.
zh: 总的来说，我公司现在经营状况良好。

en: As a rule, I prefer people who deal with matters of this kind directly with those involved.
zh: 一般来说，我更喜欢让人们直接与相关人员处理此类事务。

en: Generally the Americans are a kind people.
zh: 总的来说，美国人是善良的。

en: On the whole, I think your plan is a very good one.
zh: 总的来说，我认为你的计划非常好。

en: As a rule, he arrives at the office at about nine-thirty in the morning.
zh: 一般来说，他早上九点半左右到达办公室。

en: On the whole, the older a man grows, the more conservative he becomes.
zh: 总的来说，一个人年纪越大，就越保守。

en: On the whole, the Japanese are conservative.
zh: 总的来说，日本人是保守的。

en: As a rule, Japanese people are not good at foreign languages.
zh: 一般来说，日本人不擅长外语。

en: Generally speaking, men are stronger than women.
zh: 一般来说，男人比女人更强壮。

en: Generally speaking, boys can run faster than girls.
zh: 一般来说，男孩比女孩跑得快。

en: As a rule, the game of life is worth playing.
zh: 一般来说，人生的游戏值得一玩。

en: As a rule, the more fundamental a new truth, the greater will be its practical possibilities.
zh: 一般来说，一项新的真理越根本，它的实际可能性就越大。

en: By and large, women can bear pain better than men.
zh: 总的来说，女性比男性更能忍受痛苦。

en: By and large, reporters don't hesitate to intrude on one's privacy.
zh: 总的来说，记者们毫不犹豫地侵犯个人隐私。

en: As a rule, the inhabitants of warm countries keep early hours.
zh: 一般来说，温暖国家的人们作息时间较早。

en: In general, Susie is a nice student.
zh: 总的来说，苏西是个好学生。

en: By and large, Tom is an easygoing person in almost everything he does.
zh: 总的来说，汤姆在几乎所有事情上都是一个随和的人。

en: On the whole, Canada has a severe climate.
zh: 总的来说，加拿大的气候很恶劣。

en: If you shout from the top of a cliff, you can hear the echo of your voice.
zh: 如果你在悬崖顶上喊叫，你能听到你声音的回声。

en: There is a narrow path running along by the cliff.
zh: 有一条狭窄的小路沿着悬崖延伸。

en: Down went the bus over the cliff.
zh: 公共汽车从悬崖上掉了下去。

en: The man and his horse that fell off the cliff were soon rescued.
zh: 从悬崖上掉下去的人和马很快就被救起来了。

en: Some medicine does us harm.
zh: 有些药对我们有害。

en: You must not read such books as will do you harm.
zh: 你不能读那些对你有害的书。

en: You must not read such a magazine, as it will do you harm.
zh: 你不能读那样的杂志，因为它会对你有害。

en: Are you planning to take part in the meeting?
zh: 你打算参加会议吗？

en: Can you make out the meaning easily?
zh: 你能轻易理解它的意思吗？

en: You'll have some difficulty in carrying out the plan.
zh: 你执行这个计划会有一些困难。

en: Are you in favor of the plan or not?
zh: 你赞成这个计划吗？还是不赞成？

en: You must get rid of that bad habit.
zh: 你必须改掉那个坏习惯。

en: You must promise not to take the rope off.
zh: 你必须保证不把绳子解开。

en: You must be above such mean conduct.
zh: 你不应该有这么卑鄙的行为。

en: Did you ever hear the like of it?
zh: 你听过这种事吗？

en: You look smart in the shirt.
zh: 你穿这件衬衫看起来很精神。

en: Did you tape that concert?
zh: 你录下那场音乐会了吗？

en: Dare you ask him about it?
zh: 你敢问他这件事吗？

en: You are sure to succeed in time.
zh: 你一定会及时成功的。

en: You'd better not go there.
zh: 你最好别去那里。

en: You may go there.
zh: 你可以去那里。

en: Do you deny that you went there?
zh: 你否认你去过那里吗？

en: All you have to do is to meet her there.
zh: 你所要做的就是在那里和她见面。

en: You may as well say so.
zh: 你还不如这么说。

en: You should have done so.
zh: 你本应该那样做的。

en: You will be delayed for only thirty minutes at worst.
zh: 你最多只会耽误三十分钟。

en: You had better make a clean breast of everything.
zh: 你最好把一切都坦白出来。

en: You're wet through.
zh: 你全身都湿透了。

en: You aren't a spy, are you?
zh: 你不是间谍，对吧？

en: I hear that you've been ill.
zh: 我听说你生病了。

en: You should have told me a long time ago.
zh: 你早该告诉我的。

en: You've got a lot of guts.
zh: 你真有胆量。

en: You've filled out.
zh: 你填写好了。

en: What time will you leave?
zh: 你什么时候离开？

en: You don't understand.
zh: 你不明白。

en: You can do this with ease.
zh: 你可以轻松做到。

en: You come here.
zh: 你来这里。

en: Repetition helps you remember something.
zh: 重复有助于你记住某事。

en: Chestnuts have to be boiled for at least fifteen minutes.
zh: 栗子至少要煮十五分钟。

en: A bear will not touch a dead body.
zh: 熊不会碰死尸。

en: A bear can climb a tree.
zh: 熊会爬树。

en: The bear left no stone unturned in his search for fat bugs under the rocks.
zh: 为了寻找岩石下肥美的虫子，熊竭尽全力，不遗余力。

en: Bears also tend to sleep more during the day than at night, although in the summer, with twenty-four hours of light, this does not apply.
zh: 熊也倾向于白天比晚上睡得更多，尽管在夏天，有24小时的光照，这不适用。

en: How long does a bear sleep?
zh: 熊睡多久？

en: The bear began tearing at the tent.
zh: 熊开始撕扯帐篷。

en: When bears sleep or lie down, their postures depend on whether they want to get rid of heat or conserve it.
zh: 当熊睡觉或躺下时，它们的姿势取决于它们是想散热还是保存热量。

en: No one noticed the bear's appearance.
zh: 没有人注意到熊的出现。

en: Take off your socks, please.
zh: 请脱掉你的袜子。

en: Stockings should be of the proper size.
zh: 袜子应该尺寸合适。

en: Are my socks dry already?
zh: 我的袜子已经干了吗？

en: There is a hole in your sock.
zh: 你的袜子有个洞。

en: There are fashions for socks as well.
zh: 袜子也有流行款式。

en: Put on your shoes. Let's go out for dinner.
zh: 穿上你的鞋子。我们出去吃晚饭吧。

en: Please put on your shoes.
zh: 请穿上你的鞋子。

en: Put on your shoes.
zh: 穿上你的鞋子。

en: Before buying shoes, you should try them on.
zh: 买鞋之前，你应该试穿一下。

en: Take off your shoes.
zh: 脱掉你的鞋子。

en: I want you.
zh: 我需要你。

en: Either you or your friend is wrong.
zh: 不是你错了，就是你朋友错了。

en: I'm amazed by the ease with which you solve the problem.
zh: 你解决问题如此轻松，令我惊讶。

en: I will have left when you return.
zh: 你回来的时候，我已经离开了。

en: He will have left here by the time you return.
zh: 你回来的时候，他应该已经离开这里了。

en: I will have left here before you return.
zh: 在你回来之前，我已经离开这里了。

en: I take it from your silence that you are not satisfied with my answer.
zh: 从你的沉默来看，我想你对我的回答并不满意。

en: We thought we would write out the directions, in case you got lost.
zh: 我们想我们应该写下路线，以防你迷路。

en: I want to know if you'll be free tomorrow.
zh: 我想知道你明天是否有空。

en: I am glad that you have returned safe.
zh: 我很高兴你安全回来了。

en: What would you do if you were in my place?
zh: 如果你处在我的位置，你会怎么做？

en: I would like you to think about what you would have done in my place.
zh: 我希望你考虑一下，如果你处在我的位置，你会怎么做。

en: What would you do in my place?
zh: 如果你是我的话，你会怎么做？

en: That you don't believe me is a great pity.
zh: 你不相信我，真是太可惜了。

en: The information you gave me is of little use.
zh: 你给我的信息没什么用。

en: You or I will be chosen.
zh: 你或者我会被选中。

en: Either you or I am wrong.
zh: 不是你错了，就是我错了。

en: It is not necessary for you to take his advice if you don't want to.
zh: 如果你不想听他的建议，你不必听。

en: If you're busy, I'll help you.
zh: 如果你很忙，我会帮你。

en: Didn't they teach you common sense as well as typing at the school where you studied?
zh: 在你们学校，他们除了教你打字，难道没教你常识吗？

en: I noticed you entering my room.
zh: 我注意到你进入了我的房间。

en: Never did I dream that you would lose.
zh: 我从来没有想到你会输。

en: I will lend you whatever book you need.
zh: 你需要什么书，我都借给你。

en: I need you.
zh: 我需要你。

en: You do not necessarily have to go there yourself.
zh: 你不一定非要亲自去那里。

en: Something bad may happen to him.
zh: 他可能会遇到不好的事情。

en: Something wrong was about to happen.
zh: 好像有什么不好的事情要发生了。

en: You don't seem to understand how difficult it is for young people today to believe in something.
zh: 你似乎不明白现在的年轻人要相信一些事情有多么困难。

en: To record something, they used knotted cords made of the wool of the llama or alpaca.
zh: 为了记录一些事情，他们使用由羊驼毛或骆驼毛制成的打结的绳子。

en: If you say that you cannot help doing something, you mean you cannot prevent or avoid it.
zh: 如果你说你忍不住要做某事，你的意思是说你无法阻止或避免它。

en: Give me a ring if you find out anything.
zh: 如果你发现了什么，给我来个电话。

en: What shall I begin with?
zh: 我该从哪里开始呢？

en: Do you have any good news?
zh: 你有什么好消息吗？

en: Come what may, we must do our duty.
zh: 无论发生什么，我们都必须履行我们的职责。

en: Before buying anything, you had better ask yourself whether you cannot do without it.
zh: 在买任何东西之前，你最好先问问自己是否真的不能没有它。

en: Do you have any further questions to ask?
zh: 你还有什么其他问题要问吗？

en: I'll let you know if anything comes up.
zh: 如果有什么事发生，我会通知你的。

en: Show me some others.
zh: 给我看看其他的。

en: What did Bell invent?
zh: 贝尔发明了什么？

en: Is there anything else you want me to do?
zh: 你还有什么要我做的吗？

en: What was invented by Bell?
zh: 贝尔发明了什么？

en: Do you have any pets?
zh: 你养宠物吗？

en: I'll give you a present.
zh: 我会送你一件礼物。

en: The doctors said he would never again be able to walk without some support.
zh: 医生说他再也不能在没有任何支撑的情况下走路了。

en: Complaining about something is one way to adapt yourself to a new environment.
zh: 抱怨某事是使自己适应新环境的一种方式。

en: Can't we use a simile here?
zh: 我们这里能用个明喻吗？

en: I saw something very bright fly across the night sky.
zh: 我看到一个非常明亮的东西划过夜空。

en: What is missing?
zh: 缺少什么？

en: Something's got to give.
zh: 总得做出让步。

en: Would you like anything to eat?
zh: 你想吃点什么吗？

en: Everyone would like to believe that dreams can come true.
zh: 每个人都愿意相信梦想可以成真。

en: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
zh: 让梦想成真的最好方法就是醒来。

en: The world doesn't revolve around you.
zh: 世界不是围着你转的。

en: The world is full of fools.
zh: 这个世界到处都是傻瓜。

en: Are you saying my life is in danger?
zh: 你是说我的生命有危险吗？

en: Do you have any idea what my life is like?
zh: 你知道我的生活是什么样的吗？

en: This place has a mysterious atmosphere.
zh: 这个地方有一种神秘的气氛。

en: I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this matter.
zh: 我期待听到你对此事的想法。

en: So what if I am gay? Is it a crime?
zh: 就算我是同性恋又怎么样？这是犯罪吗？

en: My life is hollow without him.
zh: 没有他，我的生活是空虚的。

en: I don't want to fail my exams.
zh: 我不想考试不及格。

en: My mother bought two bottles of orange juice.
zh: 我妈妈买了兩瓶橙汁。

en: She was wearing a black hat.
zh: 她戴着一顶黑色的帽子。

en: We made pancakes for breakfast.
zh: 我们做了薄烤饼当早餐。

en: I spent the whole afternoon chatting with friends.
zh: 我整个下午都在和朋友聊天。

en: I want to be more independent.
zh: 我想变得更独立。

en: Are you just going to stand there all day?
zh: 你打算一整天都站在那里吗？

en: A rabbit has long ears and a short tail.
zh: 兔子有长长的耳朵和短短的尾巴。

en: My heart was filled with happiness.
zh: 我的心里充满了幸福。

en: He wishes to erase bad memories.
zh: 他希望抹去不好的记忆。

en: Sir, you are not allowed to park your car here.
zh: 先生，您不能在这里停车。

en: Your secret will be safe with me.
zh: 你的秘密我会替你保守。

en: I don't want to hear any more of your complaining.
zh: 我不想再听到你抱怨了。

en: Tell them to call me before they leave.
zh: 告诉他们在离开之前给我打电话。

en: You should have refused such an unfair proposal.
zh: 你应该拒绝这样不公平的提议。

en: Do you have bread for lunch?
zh: 你午饭有面包吗？

en: How do you account for your being late?
zh: 你如何解释你迟到的原因？

en: You won't be late, will you?
zh: 你不会迟到，是吧？

en: All you have to do is apologize for being late.
zh: 你只需要为迟到道歉。

en: You must have stayed up late.
zh: 你一定是熬夜了。

en: You must be back on Sunday at the latest.
zh: 你最晚必须在星期天回来。

en: Sooner or later, you will regret your idleness.
zh: 迟早你会后悔你的懒惰。

en: You'll learn how to do it sooner or later.
zh: 你迟早会学会怎么做的。

en: You ought to be ashamed.
zh: 你应该感到羞愧。

en: You should have refused his request flatly.
zh: 你应该断然拒绝他的请求。

en: Who are you waiting for?
zh: 你在等谁？

en: You must build up your courage.
zh: 你必须鼓起勇气。

en: Whom are you speaking of?
zh: 你在说谁？

en: You may invite whomever you like.
zh: 你可以邀请你喜欢的任何人。

en: Are you meeting someone here?
zh: 你在这里等人吗？

en: Your reading is very advanced.
zh: 你的阅读水平很高。

en: Can you tell wheat from barley?
zh: 你能分辨小麦和大麦吗？

en: You look very pale.
zh: 你看上去很苍白。

en: I'm proud of you.
zh: 我为你感到骄傲。

en: You're running a big risk in trusting him.
zh: 你信任他冒了很大的风险。

en: What do you want to be when you grow up?
zh: 你长大后想做什么？

en: Now that you are a big boy, you may do as you please.
zh: 既然你已经是个大男孩了，你可以做任何你想做的事。

en: You may take either the big box or the small one.
zh: 你可以拿大的盒子或者小的盒子。

en: You look bored.
zh: 你看上去很无聊。

en: Do you like to be kept waiting?
zh: 你喜欢被人等吗？

en: The clock that got broken must be repaired right away.
zh: 那个坏了的钟必须马上修理。

en: Can you fix the broken radio?
zh: 你能修好这个坏了的收音机吗？

en: I made a temporary repair to the broken door.
zh: 我对坏了的门做了临时修理。

en: It took three hours to put the broken toy together.
zh: 把这个坏了的玩具拼起来花了三个小时。

en: The engineers blew up the bridge because it was about to collapse.
zh: 工程师炸毁了桥，因为它快要倒塌了。

en: You must switch off the power before checking the circuit.
zh: 检查电路前，你必须关掉电源。

en: Recovery was almost impossible.
zh: 恢复几乎是不可能的。

en: May I have coupon tickets?
zh: 我可以要优惠券吗？

en: It was twenty years ago as I look back on it.
zh: 当我回首往事时，那已经是二十年前的事了。

en: I order you to turn right.
zh: 我命令你向右转。

en: About face!
zh: 向后转！

en: If it isn't out of your way, please take this letter to the post office.
zh: 如果顺路的话，请把这封信带到邮局。

en: There was a thick fog around.
zh: 周围有浓雾。

en: Don't talk around it.
zh: 别拐弯抹角。

en: Stop beating around the bush and give it to me straight!
zh: 别再拐弯抹角了，直接告诉我吧！

en: Don't say it in a roundabout way.
zh: 不要用迂回的方式说。

en: Don't beat around the bush.
zh: 别拐弯抹角。

en: You have to pay the price.
zh: 你必须付出代价。

en: I am considering how to settle the matter.
zh: 我正在考虑如何解决这件事。

en: All answers must be written according to the instructions.
zh: 所有答案都必须按照说明书写。

en: Finding a solution that worked was a process of trial and error.
zh: 找到一个可行的解决方案是一个反复试验的过程。

en: It was apparent that there was no way out.
zh: 很明显，没有出路了。

en: The settlement is a matter of time.
zh: 解决只是时间问题。

en: His explanation that a solution would take time didn't satisfy anyone.
zh: 他解释说解决问题需要时间，这并没有让任何人满意。

en: There are many problems to solve.
zh: 有很多问题需要解决。

en: Everyone has both strong and weak points.
zh: 每个人都有优点和缺点。

en: Seriously though, episode 21 made me laugh so hard I almost cried.
zh: 说真的，第21集把我笑得眼泪都快出来了。

en: My mother doesn't speak English very well.
zh: 我妈妈英语说得不太好。

en: That's where the problem is.
zh: 问题就在这里。

en: Why say sorry for something you haven't even done?
zh: 你又没做错什么，为什么要道歉？

en: Foreign people are amusing.
zh: 外国人很有趣。

en: Foreigners are interesting, aren't they?
zh: 外国人很有意思，不是吗？

en: No matter what I do, she says I can do better.
zh: 无论我做什么，她都说我可以做得更好。

en: I can't speak Japanese.
zh: 我不会说日语。

en: Stop thinking of me as just an average person.
zh: 别再把我当成一个普通人了。

en: You are no better at remembering things than I am.
zh: 你的记性和我一样差。

en: You are as tall as I am.
zh: 你和我一样高。

en: Would you like to drink anything?
zh: 你想喝点什么吗？

en: "What's happening in the cave? I'm curious." "I have no idea."
zh: “山洞里发生了什么事？我很好奇。” “我不知道。”

en: You have the same racket as I have.
zh: 你的球拍和我的一样。

en: She has as many books as I.
zh: 她的书和我一样多。

en: "Thanks for the help." "Don't mention it."
zh: “谢谢你的帮助。” “不用客气。”

en: Let me know if there's anything I can do.
zh: 如果有什么我能做的，请告诉我。

en: It's up to you to decide whether we'll go there or not.
zh: 去不去那里由你决定。

en: I want a boat that'll take me far away from here.
zh: 我想要一艘能带我远离这里的船。

en: A Japanese person would never do such a thing.
zh: 日本人是不会做这种事的。

en: If you don't eat, you'll die.
zh: 你不吃东西就会死。

en: Shall we go home?
zh: 我们回家吧？

en: I came to Tokyo three years ago and have been living here ever since.
zh: 我三年前来到东京，从那以后一直住在这里。

en: I lived for more than a month in Nagoya.
zh: 我在名古屋住了不止一个月。

en: I will be seeing her again one of these days.
zh: 总有一天我会再见到她的。

en: We are going to make up for lost time by taking a short cut.
zh: 我们要抄近路来弥补失去的时间。

en: Let's take a short cut.
zh: 我们抄近路吧。

en: Mr Kondo is the most hardworking in his company.
zh: 近藤先生是他们公司最努力工作的人。

en: Modern methods improved industry.
zh: 现代方法改进了工业。

en: The lack of modern post facilities caused trouble for many shippers.
zh: 缺乏现代邮政设施给许多托运人造成了麻烦。

en: The art of modern warfare does not necessarily require soldiers to be armed to the teeth to be effective as combatants.
zh: 现代战争的艺术并不一定要求士兵全副武装才能成为有效的战斗人员。

en: Among modern novels, this is the best.
zh: 在现代小说中，这是最好的一部。

en: Why didn't modern technology develop in China?
zh: 为什么现代科技没有在中国发展起来？

en: The advancement of modern medicine was a long process.
zh: 现代医学的进步是一个漫长的过程。

en: The whole neighborhood was surprised at the news.
zh: 整个街区都对这个消息感到惊讶。

en: His neighbors are suspicious of him.
zh: 他的邻居们怀疑他。

en: My neighbors provided food for me.
zh: 我的邻居们为我提供了食物。

en: The whole neighborhood mourned his death.
zh: 整个街区都为他的去世感到悲痛。

en: The neighbors took turns sitting up with him.
zh: 邻居们轮流守夜陪伴他。

en: You must be friendly with your neighbors.
zh: 你必须和你的邻居友好相处。

en: The neighbors made a fool of him.
zh: 邻居们捉弄了他。

en: Before saying goodbye to their neighbors, the Smiths had to tie up some loose ends inside the house.
zh: 在和邻居们告别之前，史密斯一家必须处理好房子里的一些未完成的事情。

en: Our American neighbor will have lived in Japan for five years next year.
zh: 明年我们的美国邻居将在日本居住五年。

en: There was a big fire in my neighborhood.
zh: 我的街区发生了一场大火。

en: The farmer that lived nearby came to investigate.
zh: 住在附近的农民前来调查。

en: I'm a regular at a restaurant in this neighborhood. Let's have lunch there today.
zh: 我是这个街区一家餐馆的常客。今天我们去那里吃午饭吧。

en: A fire broke out near my house.
zh: 我家附近发生了火灾。

en: Have you met the new family on the block?
zh: 你见过街区里的新家庭了吗？

en: There are a handful of naughty boys in my neighborhood.
zh: 我的街区里有几个淘气的男孩。

en: I have to take some money out of the bank.
zh: 我得从银行取点钱。

en: Do you have any idea when the bank closes?
zh: 你知道银行几点关门吗？

en: There are innumerable stars in the galaxy.
zh: 银河系里有无数颗星星。

en: Can you distinguish silver from tin?
zh: 你能区分银和锡吗？

en: It is difficult to peg the direction of interest deregulation.
zh: 很难确定利率放松管制的走向。

en: Bank lending is rising because of lower interest rates.
zh: 由于利率降低，银行贷款正在增加。

en: Falling interest rates have stimulated the automobile market.
zh: 利率下降刺激了汽车市场。

en: Six percent home loans represent the industry average now.
zh: 百分之六的房屋贷款现在代表行业平均水平。

en: I'm tied up with a project that is due Friday.
zh: 我正忙于一个周五到期的项目。

en: Be sure to telephone by Friday, OK?
zh: 一定要在周五之前打电话，好吗？

en: I need to know your answer by Friday.
zh: 我需要在周五之前知道你的答案。

en: Can you manage to complete the manuscript by Friday?
zh: 你能在周五之前完成手稿吗？

en: He said he would give us his decision for sure by Friday.
zh: 他说他肯定会在周五之前给我们他的决定。

en: Friday is the day when she is very busy.
zh: 星期五是她非常忙碌的一天。

en: Friday is when I am least busy.
zh: 星期五是我最不忙的时候。

en: Read chapter 4 for Friday.
zh: 星期五读第四章。

en: On Friday night, three men came into Mr White's hotel and asked for rooms.
zh: 星期五晚上，三个男人来到怀特先生的旅馆，要了房间。

en: There will be a dance Friday night at the high school.
zh: 星期五晚上高中将举行舞会。

en: There were no tickets available for Friday's performance.
zh: 星期五的演出没有票了。

en: Are you free on Friday afternoon?
zh: 你星期五下午有空吗？

en: The bank shuts late on Fridays.
zh: 银行星期五关门较晚。

en: We can hardly wait for the party on Friday.
zh: 我们迫不及待地想参加星期五的聚会。

en: We're going out for a meal on Friday.
zh: 我们星期五出去吃饭。

en: When Friday comes around, it's time for me to let my hair down and enjoy the weekend.
zh: 当星期五来临的时候，我就该放松一下，享受周末了。

en: A dance will be held on Friday.
zh: 星期五将举行舞会。

en: If you read this book again, you will have read it three times.
zh: 如果你再读一遍这本书，你就读了三遍了。

en: Now that you are eighteen, you can get a driver's license.
zh: 既然你已经十八岁了，你就可以考驾照了。

en: You are now old enough to support yourself.
zh: 你现在已经足够大了，可以自食其力了。

en: You surprised everybody.
zh: 你让大家都很惊讶。

en: You've been properly led up the garden path.
zh: 你被彻底地耍了。

en: You look as if it were none of your business.
zh: 你看上去好像这事跟你没关系似的。

en: You look as though nothing has happened to you.
zh: 你看上去好像什么事都没发生过一样。

en: You haven't changed at all.
zh: 你一点都没变。

en: You have made the very same mistake again.
zh: 你又犯了同样的错误。

en: Are you still smarting over my remarks?
zh: 你还在为我说的话耿耿于怀吗？

en: You haven't washed your hands yet, have you?
zh: 你还没洗手呢，是吗？

en: You're not old enough to get a driver's license.
zh: 你还没到可以考驾照的年龄。

en: Have you got a pen?
zh: 你有笔吗？

en: You will not take Bob's advice.
zh: 你不会听鲍勃的建议的。

en: Are you planning on staying long in Berlin?
zh: 你打算在柏林待很久吗？

en: Can you speak French?
zh: 你会说法语吗？

en: You can't speak French, can you?
zh: 你不会说法语，是吗？

en: You neglected to tell me to buy bread.
zh: 你忘了告诉我买面包。

en: You failed to wake Harry up.
zh: 你没能叫醒哈利。

en: You'd better go by bus.
zh: 你最好坐公交车去。

en: You must put an end to your foolish behavior.
zh: 你必须结束你愚蠢的行为。

en: You should practice playing the violin every day.
zh: 你应该每天练习拉小提琴。

en: It appears that you have made a foolish mistake.
zh: 看来你犯了一个愚蠢的错误。

en: You have to go to the party.
zh: 你必须去参加聚会。

en: You say Nessie is an imaginary being, but I think she exists.
zh: 你说尼斯湖水怪是虚构的，但我认为它存在。

en: You cannot buy that judge.
zh: 你买不通那个法官。

en: Have you ever been to that village?
zh: 你去过那个村庄吗？

en: I wish you had told me the truth then.
zh: 我真希望你当时告诉我真相。

en: Are you on the committee?
zh: 你是委员会的成员吗？

en: You should have taken a chance then.
zh: 你当时应该抓住机会的。

en: Do you know how high the television tower is?
zh: 你知道电视塔有多高吗？

en: You must stick to your promise.
zh: 你必须遵守你的承诺。

en: You're a philosopher, aren't you?
zh: 你是个哲学家，是吧？

en: You had better not associate with those men.
zh: 你最好不要和那些人交往。

en: You are supposed to come at 7 o'clock.
zh: 你应该在七点钟来。

en: You have to leave home at six.
zh: 你必须六点离开家。

en: You are expected to come by 5:00.
zh: 你应该在五点之前来。

en: You must be at the station by 5 o'clock.
zh: 你必须在五点之前到达车站。

en: You must be here till five.
zh: 你必须在这里待到五点。

en: You look the way your father did thirty years ago.
zh: 你看上去和你父亲三十年前的样子一样。

en: You must keep quiet for a few days.
zh: 你必须安静几天。

en: You'll be able to drive a car in a few days.
zh: 过几天你就能开车了。

en: You may as well have a day off, because you have been overworking those days.
zh: 你最好休息一天，因为你这些天工作过度了。

en: Can you do it in one day?
zh: 你能在一天内完成吗？

en: You should have refused his offer.
zh: 你当时应该拒绝他的提议。

en: You need to have breakfast.
zh: 你需要吃早餐。

en: Did you leave the window open?
zh: 你离开的时候窗户开着吗？

en: You should by all means read the book.
zh: 你无论如何都应该读这本书。

en: You should be ashamed of your folly.
zh: 你应该为你的愚蠢感到羞愧。

en: Are you doing what you think is right?
zh: 你正在做你认为正确的事情吗？

en: He is something of a scholar.
zh: 他有点像个学者。

en: There is no easy process of learning.
zh: 学习没有简单的过程。

en: Some scholars ascribe the settlement of America to social unrest in Western Europe.
zh: 一些学者认为，美洲的殖民归因于西欧的社会动荡。

en: According to some scholars, a major earthquake could occur at any moment now.
zh: 一些学者认为，随时可能发生大地震。

en: Scholarly as he is, he can't be relied on.
zh: 他虽然学识渊博，但不可靠。

en: A man of learning is not always a man of sense.
zh: 有学问的人不一定有头脑。

en: He is proud of his scholarship.
zh: 他为自己的学识感到自豪。

en: In terms of learning, he is superior to all of his friends.
zh: 在学习方面，他胜过他所有的朋友。

en: Learning is one thing, and common sense another.
zh: 学习是一回事，常识是另一回事。

en: He was very learned, but he didn't know it.
zh: 他很有学问，但他自己不知道。

en: It should be clear that the curriculum reform is mandatory in order to enhance interdisciplinary research.
zh: 应该明确的是，课程改革对于加强跨学科研究是强制性的。

en: Our school administration decided to do away with that school rule.
zh: 我们学校的管理部门决定废除那条校规。

en: My time in school will be one of my happiest memories.
zh: 我的在校时光将是我最快乐的回忆之一。

en: School systems have to cope with changing numbers of pupils.
zh: 学校系统必须应对不断变化的学生人数。

en: I usually went to bed at ten in my school days.
zh: 我上学的时候通常十点睡觉。

en: He was very happy in his school days.
zh: 他在上学的时候非常快乐。

en: I would often take part in an English speech contest in my school days.
zh: 我上学的时候经常参加英语演讲比赛。

en: He ended up expelled.
zh: 他最终被开除了。

en: On leaving school, he went to Africa.
zh: 离开学校后，他去了非洲。

en: I graduated from the school.
zh: 我从这所学校毕业了。

en: On leaving school, he went into business.
zh: 离开学校后，他开始经商。

en: On leaving school, she got married to her classmate.
zh: 离开学校后，她和她的同学结婚了。

en: What are you going to do after you leave school?
zh: 你毕业后打算做什么？

en: I will have to wait till I finish schooling and start earning money.
zh: 我必须等到完成学业并开始赚钱。

en: What a fool he is to leave school.
zh: 他离开学校真是个傻瓜。

en: All you have to do is to take care of yourself.
zh: 你只需要照顾好自己。

en: You may have read this book already.
zh: 你可能已经读过这本书了。

en: You will be up against many difficulties.
zh: 你将会面临许多困难。

en: You mustn't depend on others for help.
zh: 你不能依赖别人来寻求帮助。

en: You are too inquisitive about other people's affairs.
zh: 你对别人的事情太爱打听了。

en: You are too critical of others' shortcomings.
zh: 你对别人的缺点太吹毛求疵了。

en: Can you throw a fastball?
zh: 你能投快速球吗？

en: You depend too much on others.
zh: 你太依赖别人了。

en: You have foul breath.
zh: 你有口臭。

en: You are too sensitive to noise.
zh: 你对噪音太敏感了。

en: You look tiny next to a sumo wrestler.
zh: 你站在相扑选手旁边显得很娇小。

en: You know quite a lot about Sumo.
zh: 你对相扑了解挺多的。

en: You're giving me the same old line.
zh: 你又在跟我说老一套。

en: You look as healthy as ever.
zh: 你看上去和以前一样健康。

en: You are to apologize to her for it.
zh: 你应该为此向她道歉。

en: All you have to do is try your best.
zh: 你只需要尽力而为。

en: You should have locked, or at least closed, all the doors.
zh: 你应该锁上，或者至少关上所有的门。

en: You never listen. I might as well talk to the wall.
zh: 你从来不听。我简直就像是对着墙说话。

en: You are a good student.
zh: 你是个好学生。

en: Can't you tell right from wrong?
zh: 你分不清是非吗？

en: You should distinguish between right and wrong.
zh: 你应该明辨是非。

en: You would do well to tell it to him in advance.
zh: 你最好提前告诉他。

en: You will have heard this story before.
zh: 你以前肯定听过这个故事。

en: You made the same mistake as last time.
zh: 你犯了和上次一样的错误。

en: Are you for the war or against it?
zh: 你支持战争还是反对战争？

en: Have you finished reading the novel?
zh: 你读完那本小说了吗？

en: You make too much of the event.
zh: 你把这件事看得太重了。

en: Are you sure about the cost of that car?
zh: 你确定那辆车的价格吗？

en: You should emphasize that fact.
zh: 你应该强调那个事实。

en: You need not take account of the fact.
zh: 你不需要考虑那个事实。

en: How do you account for the fact?
zh: 你如何解释这个事实？

en: You must state the fact as it is.
zh: 你必须如实陈述事实。

en: You have no business complaining about the matter.
zh: 你没有理由抱怨这件事。

en: Did you watch the game?
zh: 你看比赛了吗？

en: Did you cut the paper?
zh: 你剪纸了吗？

en: You must look after the child.
zh: 你必须照顾好这个孩子。

en: You may as well do the task now.
zh: 你现在最好把这项任务做了。

en: Will you take on the job?
zh: 你愿意承担这项工作吗？

en: You have to overcome the difficulties.
zh: 你必须克服这些困难。

en: You have a responsibility to explain that behavior to me.
zh: 你有责任向我解释那种行为。

en: You owe me an apology for that.
zh: 你欠我一个道歉。

en: You have to account for the result.
zh: 你必须对结果负责。

en: You must inform your superior of the results.
zh: 你必须将结果告知你的上级。

en: You should abide by the consequences.
zh: 你应该承担后果。

en: You are responsible for the result.
zh: 你对结果负责。

en: You should carry out the plan on schedule.
zh: 你应该按计划执行这个计划。

en: Are you for or against the plan?
zh: 你赞成还是反对这个计划？

en: You shouldn't have eaten the fish raw.
zh: 你不应该生吃那条鱼。

en: Did you ever see the fish?
zh: 你见过那条鱼吗？

en: You have to raise funds for the relief work.
zh: 你必须为救援工作筹集资金。

en: It may be said, as a rule, that the climate of Japan is mild.
zh: 一般来说，日本的气候是温和的。

en: Generally speaking, the climate of Japan is mild.
zh: 总的来说，日本的气候是温和的。

en: As a rule we have much rain in June in Japan.
zh: 一般来说，日本六月份雨水很多。

en: As a rule, twins have a lot in common.
zh: 一般来说，双胞胎有很多共同点。

en: In general, people were against the consumption tax.
zh: 总的来说，人们反对消费税。

en: As a rule, man is inclined to be lazy.
zh: 一般来说，人倾向于懒惰。

en: Generally speaking, women are better linguists than men.
zh: 一般来说，女性比男性更擅长语言。

en: Generally speaking girls are better linguists than boys.
zh: 一般来说，女孩比男孩更擅长语言。

en: As a rule, we have a lot of rain in fall.
zh: 一般来说，秋天雨水很多。

en: Altogether, things are going well.
zh: 总的来说，事情进展顺利。

en: As a rule, I prefer a comedy to a tragedy.
zh: 一般来说，我更喜欢喜剧而不是悲剧。

en: I like Chinese food in general.
zh: 我总的来说喜欢中国菜。

en: On the whole, I am in favor of your opinion.
zh: 总的来说，我赞成你的意见。

en: As a rule, our English teacher gives a lot of homework.
zh: 一般来说，我们的英语老师布置很多作业。

en: Generally speaking, what she says is right.
zh: 总的来说，她说的是对的。

en: Generally speaking, the climate here is mild.
zh: 一般来说，这里气候温和。

en: In general the relation between parents and children is essentially based on teaching.
zh: 一般来说，父母和子女之间的关系本质上是基于教育。

en: Generally speaking, women live longer than men.
zh: 一般来说，女性比男性活得更长。

en: On the whole, the country has a severe climate.
zh: 总的来说，这个国家的气候很恶劣。

en: Generally speaking, Americans are very fond of coffee.
zh: 一般来说，美国人非常喜欢咖啡。

en: Generally speaking, we Japanese are a little too timid in speaking foreign languages.
zh: 总的来说，我们日本人说外语时有点过于胆怯。

en: The weather in Florida is generally moderate.
zh: 佛罗里达的天气通常是温和的。

en: As a rule, hail falls in summer.
zh: 一般来说，冰雹在夏天落下。

en: On the whole, the result was unsatisfactory.
zh: 总的来说，结果是不令人满意的。

en: On the whole, the elite are not sensitive to criticism.
zh: 总的来说，精英阶层对批评不敏感。

en: Your opinion is far different from mine.
zh: 你的意见和我的大相径庭。

en: Your opinion is very constructive.
zh: 你的意见很有建设性。

en: I agree with some of your opinions.
zh: 我同意你的一些观点。

en: Are your opinions representative of those of the other students?
zh: 你的意见能代表其他学生的意见吗？

en: Your opinion is off the mark. That's plain to anyone.
zh: 你的意见离题万里，明眼人一看便知。

en: Granting that favor is out of the question.
zh: 给予那种恩惠是不可能的。

en: Do you think that you can put your idea into practice?
zh: 你认为你能把你的想法付诸实践吗？

en: Your idea sounds like a good one.
zh: 你的想法听起来不错。

en: It all depends how you handle it.
zh: 这完全取决于你如何处理。

en: I'm annoyed at your selfishness.
zh: 我讨厌你的自私。

en: Do the first example in your workbook.
zh: 做你练习册上的第一个例题。

en: I'll study your report.
zh: 我会研究你的报告。

en: Your report is pretty good, if not excellent.
zh: 你的报告非常好，如果不是说优秀的话。

en: There are several spelling errors in your essay.
zh: 你的文章里有几个拼写错误。

en: I was disappointed with your paper.
zh: 我对你的论文感到失望。

en: If it had not been for your raincoat, I would have been drenched to the skin.
zh: 如果不是你的雨衣，我早就被淋透了。

en: Had it not been for your raincoat, I would have been drenched to the skin.
zh: 如果不是你的雨衣，我早就被淋透了。

en: Will you give me your radio for my bicycle?
zh: 你愿意用你的收音机换我的自行车吗？

en: Your selfishness will lose you your friends.
zh: 你的自私会让你失去朋友。

en: Your sense of humor is beginning to exert itself.
zh: 你的幽默感开始显露出来了。

en: I entirely approve of what you say.
zh: 我完全赞同你所说的。

en: I am losing my patience with you.
zh: 我对你越来越没耐心了。

en: I don't know what to make of your actions.
zh: 我不知道该如何理解你的行为。

en: Your method is different from mine.
zh: 你的方法和我的不同。

en: You're on the right track.
zh: 你走对了方向。

en: The audience applauded the actress.
zh: 观众为这位女演员鼓掌。

en: The audience was immersed in an aftertaste of the concert.
zh: 观众沉浸在音乐会的回味中。

en: The spectators were moved by her graceful performance.
zh: 观众被她优雅的表演感动了。

en: It is not what you read but how you read it that counts.
zh: 重要的不是你读什么，而是你如何读。

en: A new treatment for hepatitis is being studied.
zh: 一种治疗肝炎的新方法正在研究中。

en: Canned food doesn't interest her.
zh: 她对罐头食品不感兴趣。

en: The can is empty.
zh: 罐子是空的。

en: Check all the loose knots and fasten them tight.
zh: 检查所有松散的结，把它们系紧。

en: I had no difficulty in finding his office.
zh: 我很容易就找到了他的办公室。

en: That which is easily acquired is easily lost.
zh: 容易得到的东西也容易失去。

en: To make a long story short, we married.
zh: 长话短说，我们结婚了。

en: To put it briefly, I do not agree.
zh: 简而言之，我不同意。

en: I'm sure it'll be easy to find a place.
zh: 我相信很容易找到地方。

en: People could have avoided many mistakes by simple experiments.
zh: 人们可以通过简单的实验避免许多错误。

en: As it is written in simple English, this book is easy to read.
zh: 因为是用简单的英语写的，这本书很容易读。

en: It is written in simple English.
zh: 这是用简单的英语写的。

en: It's simple. Just ask anybody.
zh: 这很简单。随便问个人就行。

en: Brevity is the soul of wit.
zh: 简洁是智慧的灵魂。

en: Briefly stated, Hobsbawm's thesis is that the history of the twentieth century is that of the decline of civilization.
zh: 简而言之，霍布斯鲍姆的论点是，二十世纪的历史是文明衰落的历史。

en: I need a concise explanation.
zh: 我需要一个简洁的解释。

en: Will you show me how to set up a cot?
zh: 你能教我怎么搭折叠床吗？

en: The orchestra struck up nostalgic music.
zh: 管弦乐队奏起了怀旧的音乐。

en: Water shot from the pipe.
zh: 水从管子里喷射出来。

en: Nurses attend sick people.
zh: 护士照顾病人。

en: The nurse is dressed in white.
zh: 护士穿着白色的衣服。

en: You must put an end to this foolish behavior.
zh: 你必须停止这种愚蠢的行为。

en: You are fortunate for having such good friends.
zh: 你有这么好的朋友，真是幸运。

en: Did you do this on your own?
zh: 这是你一个人做的吗？

en: You have to put up with all these noises.
zh: 你必须忍受所有这些噪音。

en: I hope you can come up with a better plan than this.
zh: 我希望你能想出一个比这更好的计划。

en: You must put these mistakes right.
zh: 你必须改正这些错误。

en: Have you read this book already?
zh: 你已经读过这本书了吗？

en: Have you read this book yet?
zh: 你读过这本书了吗？

en: You have only to read a few pages of this book.
zh: 你只需要读这本书的几页。

en: You are not to leave this room.
zh: 你不准离开这个房间。

en: Do you know what this box is made of?
zh: 你知道这个盒子是什么做的吗？

en: You have to put up with all this noise.
zh: 你必须忍受所有这些噪音。

en: Where did you go last Sunday?
zh: 你上周日去哪儿了？

en: Can you swim across the river?
zh: 你能游过这条河吗？

en: All you have to do is sign this paper.
zh: 你只需要在这张纸上签字。

en: You must get this homework finished by the day after tomorrow.
zh: 你必须在后天之前完成这项作业。

en: You are not excused from the responsibility for this serious situation.
zh: 你不能逃避对这种严重情况的责任。

en: You will come to like this kind of music.
zh: 你会喜欢上这种音乐的。

en: You can use this car.
zh: 你可以用这辆车。

en: You are asking too much for this car.
zh: 你这辆车要价太高了。

en: Since you have nothing to do with this matter, you don't have to worry.
zh: 既然你和这件事无关，你就不必担心。

en: You are old enough to understand this.
zh: 你已经足够大，可以理解这个了。

en: Can you make sense of this poem?
zh: 你能理解这首诗的意思吗？

en: You are suitable for the job.
zh: 你很适合这份工作。

en: You'll have this composition written by noon tomorrow, won't you?
zh: 你明天中午之前会写完这篇作文，对吧？

en: The tourists wandered around the stores.
zh: 游客们在商店周围闲逛。

en: The tourists painted the whole town red.
zh: 游客们把整个城镇闹翻天了。

en: The way tourists dress offends the local standard of propriety.
zh: 游客的穿着冒犯了当地的礼仪标准。

en: The number of tourists has increased greatly in recent years.
zh: 近年来游客数量大幅增加。

en: Tourists have increased in number.
zh: 游客人数增加了。

en: Have the tourists all gone on board?
zh: 游客都上船了吗？

en: Would you give me some travel brochures from your country?
zh: 你能给我一些你国家的旅游手册吗？

en: Where is the tourist information office?
zh: 旅游信息中心在哪里？

en: Please refer to the tourist information office.
zh: 请参考旅游信息中心。

en: The tourist information center gave a city map to whoever asked it.
zh: 旅游信息中心给每个索要的人都提供了一份城市地图。

en: I want to get a sightseeing visa.
zh: 我想办一个观光签证。

en: Tourism is important to the economy of my country.
zh: 旅游业对我国的经济很重要。

en: The sightseeing bus ran through a long tunnel.
zh: 观光巴士穿过了一条长长的隧道。

en: Is there a tour guide available?
zh: 有导游吗？

en: Tourism generated many new jobs.
zh: 旅游业创造了许多新的就业机会。

en: It would demoralize the opposing team to give it the razz from the spectators' side.
zh: 如果从观众席上发出嘘声，会打击对方球队的士气。

en: The audience reacted in different ways to her performance.
zh: 观众对她的表演反应各不相同。

en: I've staked out places for us in the front row of the auditorium.
zh: 我已经在礼堂前排为我们占好了位置。

en: His home run excited the crowd.
zh: 他的本垒打让观众兴奋不已。

en: The audience was carried away by his touching performance.
zh: 观众被他感人的表演所打动。

en: The audience appeared bored.
zh: 观众显得很无聊。

en: The audience is really charged up.
zh: 观众们都非常兴奋。

en: With a scream the spectators scattered.
zh: 观众们尖叫着四处逃散。

en: The audience sobbed throughout the climax of the movie.
zh: 在电影的高潮部分，观众们都在啜泣。

en: The audience applauded for a full five minutes.
zh: 观众鼓掌足足五分钟。

en: Scientists can easily compute the distance between planets.
zh: 科学家们可以很容易地计算出行星之间的距离。

en: Scientists deal mainly with physical matters.
zh: 科学家主要研究物理问题。

en: Scientists have come up with many explanations for why the sky is blue.
zh: 对于天空为什么是蓝色的，科学家们提出了许多解释。

en: The scientist maintained that the theory should be tested through experiments.
zh: 那位科学家坚持认为该理论应该通过实验来验证。

en: The scientist insisted on proceeding with the research.
zh: 那位科学家坚持继续进行这项研究。

en: A scientist had to know how to ask the correct question and to state it so clearly that the answer would be, in effect, a definite yes or no, not "maybe".
zh: 一位科学家必须知道如何提出正确的问题，并且清楚地陈述它，以至于答案实际上是一个明确的“是”或“否”，而不是“可能”。

en: Some scientists predict that the world oil reserves will be used up within a century.
zh: 一些科学家预测，世界石油储量将在一个世纪内耗尽。

en: According to scientists, the atmosphere is getting warmer year after year.
zh: 根据科学家的说法，大气一年比一年变暖。

en: Scientists say many factors bring about changes in weather.
zh: 科学家说，许多因素导致了天气的变化。

en: I am determined to be a scientist.
zh: 我决心成为一名科学家。

en: Scientists will come up with new methods of increasing the world's food supply.
zh: 科学家们将会提出增加世界粮食供应的新方法。

en: Scientists regard the discovery as important.
zh: 科学家们认为这项发现很重要。

en: Scientists began to find answers to these questions.
zh: 科学家们开始找到这些问题的答案。

en: Scientists are working hard to put an end to AIDS.
zh: 科学家们正在努力结束艾滋病。

en: Scientists are fighting to stem the spread of the AIDS virus.
zh: 科学家们正在努力阻止艾滋病病毒的传播。

en: It is not good for a scientist to get emotional.
zh: 科学家过于情绪化是不好的。

en: As scientists keep insisting, there is neither good nor bad in any scientific discovery.
zh: 正如科学家们一直坚持认为的那样，任何科学发现本身都没有好坏之分。

en: Technology is in itself meaningless unless it serves mankind.
zh: 技术本身毫无意义，除非它为人类服务。

en: Technology has failed to ease the conflict between man and nature.
zh: 技术未能缓解人与自然之间的冲突。

en: Science and technology have come to pervade every aspect of our lives and, as a result, society is changing at a speed which is quite unprecedented.
zh: 科学技术已经渗透到我们生活的方方面面，因此，社会正以一种前所未有的速度发生变化。

en: Technology has differentiated our cultures.
zh: 技术已经使我们的文化产生了差异。

en: Technology has given us immense power.
zh: 技术赋予了我们巨大的力量。

en: Some people argue that technology has negative effects.
zh: 有些人认为技术有负面影响。

en: A revolution has occurred in technology.
zh: 技术领域发生了一场革命。

en: A great revolution has taken place in technology.
zh: 技术领域发生了一场伟大的革命。

en: We found him alive.
zh: 我们发现他还活着。

en: We must continue to study as long as we live.
zh: 我们必须活到老学到老。

en: We will get to Tokyo Station at noon.
zh: 我们中午会到达东京站。

en: We are to meet at noon.
zh: 我们应该中午见面。

en: We studied the government's economic policy.
zh: 我们研究了政府的经济政策。

en: We argued politics.
zh: 我们争论政治。

en: We should observe the speed limit.
zh: 我们应该遵守速度限制。

en: We are longing for world peace.
zh: 我们渴望世界和平。

en: We are anxious for world peace.
zh: 我们渴望世界和平。

en: We should make every effort to maintain world peace.
zh: 我们应该尽一切努力维护世界和平。

en: We beamed the message to the world.
zh: 我们向世界播发了这条消息。

en: We debated on the question of world population.
zh: 我们辩论了世界人口问题。

en: We provided the flood victims with food and clothing.
zh: 我们向洪水灾民提供了食物和衣物。

en: We found it very hard going back to our base camp in the blizzard.
zh: 我们发现在暴风雪中返回我们的大本营非常困难。

en: We compare life to a journey.
zh: 我们把人生比作旅程。

en: We shall continue our efforts to eradicate racial discrimination.
zh: 我们将继续努力消除种族歧视。

en: We cannot stand quiet and watch people starve.
zh: 我们不能袖手旁观，眼睁睁地看着人们挨饿。

en: We have just enough to live.
zh: 我们只有勉强够生活的钱。

en: We talked in sign language.
zh: 我们用手语交谈。

en: We exchanged phone numbers at the end of the gathering.
zh: 聚会结束时，我们交换了电话号码。

en: We deepened our friendship.
zh: 我们加深了友谊。

en: We entered into a serious conversation.
zh: 我们开始了一次严肃的谈话。

en: We went due north.
zh: 我们正北方向走。

en: We cleared a path through the woods.
zh: 我们在树林中开辟了一条道路。

en: We went astray in the woods.
zh: 我们在树林里迷路了。

en: Fruits have seeds in them.
zh: 水果里面有种子。

en: Few flowers develop into fruit.
zh: 很少有花会结果。

en: Fruit trees require a large amount of space in which to grow.
zh: 果树需要很大的生长空间。

en: I strolled along the streets to kill time.
zh: 我沿着街道漫步来打发时间。

en: Let's play some video games to kill time.
zh: 我们玩些电子游戏来打发时间吧。

en: The more leisure he has, the happier he is.
zh: 他越闲，就越快乐。

en: You may go at your leisure.
zh: 你可以悠闲地去。

en: Read this book at your leisure.
zh: 你可以闲暇时读这本书。

en: If you are free, come around to see me.
zh: 如果你有空，就过来看看我。

en: Don't you have anything better to do?
zh: 你难道没有更好的事情可做吗？

en: What do you do in your free time?
zh: 你空闲的时候做什么？

en: Come and see me whenever you are free.
zh: 只要你有空就过来看看我。

en: I'm free.
zh: 我有空。

en: Do this at your leisure.
zh: 你方便的时候做这件事。

en: You'll have to attend the ceremony whether you are free or busy.
zh: 无论你有没有空，你都必须参加这个典礼。

en: Being free, she went out for a walk.
zh: 因为有空，她出去散步了。

en: Scientific knowledge has greatly advanced since the 16th century.
zh: 自16世纪以来，科学知识已经大大进步了。

en: With every increase of scientific knowledge, man's power for evil is increased in the same proportion as his power for good.
zh: 随着科学知识的每一次增长，人类作恶的力量也以与为善的力量相同的比例增长。

en: Scientific truth is a creation of the human mind.
zh: 科学真理是人类思维的创造。

en: Scientific research is not a mechanical routine, but a continuing struggle on the part of the scientist.
zh: 科学研究不是机械的例行公事，而是科学家们持续不断的奋斗。

en: This theory was founded on a scientific basis.
zh: 这个理论是建立在科学基础上的。

en: Scientific discoveries don't always make the world a better place.
zh: 科学发现并不总是让世界变得更美好。

en: Reading science fiction sometimes does much to encourage a scientific view of the universe.
zh: 阅读科幻小说有时对鼓励人们用科学的眼光看待宇宙大有帮助。

en: Scientists seem to have known the truth.
zh: 科学家们似乎已经知道了真相。

en: Scientists have been discovering new drugs, so there is always hope for the unconscious person.
zh: 科学家们一直在发现新药，所以对于无意识的人来说，总是有希望的。

en: We have the alternative of death and submission.
zh: 我们有死亡和屈服这两个选择。

en: Nothing bars our way.
zh: 没有什么能阻挡我们的道路。

en: We had an implicit agreement that we would support each other.
zh: 我们有一个默契的协议，我们会互相支持。

en: We had a slight difference of opinion.
zh: 我们之间有一点意见分歧。

en: It is not necessary for us to attend the meeting.
zh: 我们没有必要参加会议。

en: Stay here with us.
zh: 和我们待在这里。

en: Let us do the work.
zh: 让我们来做这项工作。

en: We Germans fear God, but nothing else in the world.
zh: 我们德国人敬畏上帝，但除此之外，什么都不怕。

en: We're getting nowhere with those problems.
zh: 我们在解决这些问题上毫无进展。

en: Our departure tomorrow is contingent on fair weather.
zh: 我们明天的出发取决于天气是否晴朗。

en: To our great surprise, she held her breath for three minutes.
zh: 令我们非常惊讶的是，她屏住了呼吸三分钟。

en: It is difficult for us to persuade him.
zh: 我们很难说服他。

en: We were unable to make contact with them until it was too late.
zh: 直到为时已晚，我们才能够与他们取得联系。

en: The church we went past crumbled five minutes afterwards due to a huge earthquake and more than a 100 churchgoers were buried alive.
zh: 我们路过的那座教堂，五分钟后因一场巨大的地震而倒塌，一百多名做礼拜的人被活埋。

en: It is good for us to understand other cultures.
zh: 了解其他文化对我们有好处。

en: It will be little more than a hundred years before we use all the oil up.
zh: 再过一百多年，我们就会用完所有的石油。

en: We were having a quiet supper when out of the blue my mother announced she was going back to school.
zh: 我们正在安静地吃晚饭，突然我妈妈宣布她要重返学校。

en: Heat and light are necessary for our existence.
zh: 热和光对我们的生存是必要的。

en: It is up to you whether we can succeed or not.
zh: 我们能否成功取决于你。

en: We have only a slender chance of success.
zh: 我们只有一线成功的希望。

en: We know the truth, not only by reason, but also at heart.
zh: 我们知道真相，不仅通过理性，也通过内心。

en: I hope the weather clears up before we have to leave.
zh: 我希望在我们离开之前天气能好转。

en: Our meeting was just an accident.
zh: 我们的相遇只是一个意外。

en: It was just an accident that we met.
zh: 我们相遇只是一个意外。

en: If we hang tight, I'm sure we can make it through these bad times.
zh: 如果我们坚持下去，我相信我们能度过这些艰难的时期。

en: In the near future, we will be able to put an end to AIDS.
zh: 在不久的将来，我们将能够终结艾滋病。

en: These problems will be solved in the near future.
zh: 这些问题在不久的将来会得到解决。

en: Before long, we'll be able to communicate with each other by T.V. telephone.
zh: 不久之后，我们将能够通过电视电话互相交流。

en: We will soon most likely be charged for garbage disposal by how much of it there is.
zh: 我们很可能很快就会根据垃圾的数量来收取垃圾处理费。

en: They dance in circles to communicate a short distance, and shake their bodies and dart back and forth to indicate a longer distance.
zh: 它们跳圈舞来传递短距离的信息，摇动身体并来回冲刺来表示更远的距离。

en: I'll get in touch with you soon.
zh: 我会尽快和你联系。

en: I'll drop in on you sometime in the near future.
zh: 我会在不久的将来拜访你。

en: I hope it won't be long before I hear from her.
zh: 我希望不久就能收到她的来信。

en: One of these fine days he will get his just deserts.
zh: 总有一天他会得到应有的报应。

en: I hope to see his picture soon.
zh: 我希望很快能看到他的照片。

en: They say we'll have an earthquake one of these days.
zh: 他们说总有一天我们会发生地震。

en: It is said that there will be a big earthquake in the near future.
zh: 据说在不久的将来会发生大地震。

en: It is said that there will be an election soon.
zh: 据说很快就要举行选举了。

en: Spring will be here before long.
zh: 春天很快就会到来。

en: Why don't you come to my house one of these days?
zh: 哪天你来我家坐坐怎么样？

en: This city will suffer from an acute water shortage unless it rains soon.
zh: 如果再不下雨，这个城市将遭受严重的缺水。

en: I look forward to meeting you again soon.
zh: 我期待着很快再次见到你。

en: I'm looking forward to seeing you again soon.
zh: 我期待着很快再次见到你。

en: We'll meet some time soon.
zh: 我们很快会找个时间见面。

en: I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
zh: 我期待着很快收到你的来信。

en: You'll be hearing from us soon.
zh: 你很快就会收到我们的消息。

en: I'll be able to see you one of these days.
zh: 总有一天我能见到你。

en: I'll come and see you one of these days.
zh: 总有一天我会来看你。

en: I would like to call on you one of these days.
zh: 我想找个时间拜访你。

en: We'll visit you one of these days.
zh: 总有一天我们会去看你。

en: You should pay more attention to what he says.
zh: 你应该更注意他说的话。

en: You must pay attention to him.
zh: 你必须注意他。

en: You should pay more attention to his warnings.
zh: 你应该更注意他的警告。

en: You ought to have adopted his plan.
zh: 你本应该采纳他的计划。

en: You must make allowance for his lack of experience.
zh: 你必须考虑到他缺乏经验。

en: It's better to ignore his eccentricities.
zh: 最好忽略他的怪癖。

en: You should not play on his generous nature.
zh: 你不应该利用他的慷慨天性。

en: You had better not play on his generous nature.
zh: 你最好不要利用他的慷慨天性。

en: You overestimate him.
zh: 你高估他了。

en: You can depend on his help.
zh: 你可以依靠他的帮助。

en: Did you accept his statement as true?
zh: 你接受了他的说法是真的吗？

en: You should have told him the truth.
zh: 你本应该告诉他真相。

en: You must compensate him for the money he lost.
zh: 你必须赔偿他损失的钱。

en: You cannot expect much of him.
zh: 你不能对他期望太高。

en: You should tell him the truth.
zh: 你应该告诉他真相。

en: You had better tell him the truth.
zh: 你最好告诉他真相。

en: You ought to ask him for advice.
zh: 你应该向他请教。

en: It would be better for you not to ask him for advice.
zh: 你最好不要向他请教。

en: Didn't you write a letter to him?
zh: 你没给他写信吗？

en: You need only ask him to pay the debt.
zh: 你只需要让他还债。

en: You told him that he should have a reward.
zh: 你告诉他他应该得到奖励。

en: I don't think you can gain his ear.
zh: 我认为你无法得到他的倾听。

en: You ought to thank him.
zh: 你应该感谢他。

en: You have only to give him a little help.
zh: 你只需要给他一点帮助。

en: You ought not to have said a thing like that to him.
zh: 你不应该对他说那样的话。

en: I'm thinking of visiting you one of these days.
zh: 我打算过几天去看你。

en: May I come to see you one of these days?
zh: 我能过几天去看你吗？

en: I'm looking forward to seeing you one of these days.
zh: 我期待着过几天见到你。

en: Tension is a major cause of heart disease.
zh: 精神紧张是导致心脏病的主要原因。

en: The fiscal austerity may lead to an overkill of the economy.
zh: 财政紧缩可能会导致经济矫枉过正。

en: What is the emergency telephone number?
zh: 紧急电话号码是多少？

en: Report to the emergency room.
zh: 去急诊室报到。

en: We have reserved a lot of food for emergencies.
zh: 我们为紧急情况储备了很多食物。

en: An emergency may occur at any time.
zh: 紧急情况可能随时发生。

en: I canceled my appointment because of urgent business.
zh: 因为有急事，我取消了预约。

en: I need to make an urgent call. Is there a public phone near here?
zh: 我需要打个紧急电话。这附近有公用电话吗？

en: Don't look to me for any help except in case of emergency.
zh: 除非紧急情况，否则别指望我提供任何帮助。

en: In case of an emergency, call the police.
zh: 如果发生紧急情况，请报警。

en: This rule doesn't apply to emergencies.
zh: 这条规则不适用于紧急情况。

en: What number should I call in case of an emergency?
zh: 如果发生紧急情况，我应该拨打什么号码？

en: In case of an emergency, push this button.
zh: 如果发生紧急情况，请按此按钮。

en: In case of emergency, call 119.
zh: 紧急情况下，请拨打119。

en: In case of an emergency, dial 110.
zh: 紧急情况下，请拨打110。

en: In case of an emergency, get in touch with my agent.
zh: 如果发生紧急情况，请与我的经纪人联系。

en: In case of emergency, call the police.
zh: 如果发生紧急情况，请报警。

en: In case of an emergency, get in touch with my agent right away.
zh: 如果发生紧急情况，请立即与我的经纪人联系。

en: Muscle tissue consists of innumerable cells.
zh: 肌肉组织由无数细胞组成。

en: My muscles have got soft.
zh: 我的肌肉变得松弛了。

en: Apart from the plot, the book interested me.
zh: 除了情节之外，这本书引起了我的兴趣。

en: During prohibition days, racketeers used to rub each other out to get control of the rum-running racket.
zh: 在禁酒时期，敲诈勒索者常常互相残杀，以控制走私朗姆酒的非法活动。

en: The sky was full of stars.
zh: 天空繁星点点。

en: Not a star was to be seen in the sky.
zh: 天空中一颗星星也看不见。

en: There are more stars in the sky than I can count.
zh: 天上的星星多得数不清。

en: There were several stars to be seen in the sky.
zh: 天空中可以看到几颗星星。

en: There are billions of stars in the sky.
zh: 天空中有着数十亿颗星星。

en: There isn't a single cloud in the sky.
zh: 天空万里无云。

en: Not a single cloud could be seen in the sky.
zh: 天空中看不到一片云。

en: There was not a cloud in the sky.
zh: 天空没有一丝云彩。

en: There is a mass of dark clouds in the sky.
zh: 天空乌云密布。

en: There were a lot of stars seen in the sky.
zh: 天空中看到了许多星星。

en: Many stars were shining in the heavens.
zh: 许多星星在天空中闪耀。

en: You can see a lot of stars in the sky.
zh: 你可以在天空中看到很多星星。

en: The contrast between the sky and the mountain is striking.
zh: 天空和山之间的对比非常鲜明。

en: Birds were singing in the sky.
zh: 鸟儿在天空中歌唱。

en: We have three spare rooms, none of which can be used.
zh: 我们有三间空余的房间，但都不能用。

en: Empty cans were scattered about the place.
zh: 空罐子散落在各处。

en: Drinking on an empty stomach is bad for your health.
zh: 空腹喝酒对你的健康有害。

en: The brightness of the sky showed that the storm had passed.
zh: 天空的明亮表明暴风雨已经过去了。

en: The sky has brightened.
zh: 天空放晴了。

en: Do you know the reason why the sky looks blue?
zh: 你知道天空为什么看起来是蓝色的吗？

en: The sky has become clear.
zh: 天空变得晴朗了。

en: The sky seemed to blend with the sea.
zh: 天空似乎与大海融为一体。

en: The sky has become overcast.
zh: 天空变得阴沉了。

en: The sky is getting dark.
zh: 天空正在变暗。

en: Seen from the sky, the bridge appears more beautiful.
zh: 从空中看，这座桥显得更加美丽。

en: It's a dead end.
zh: 这是一条死路。

en: Elephants are the largest land animals alive today.
zh: 大象是现今存活的最大的陆地动物。

en: Cheese is a solid food made from the milk of cows, goats, sheep, and other mammals.
zh: 奶酪是一种固体食物，由牛、山羊、绵羊和其他哺乳动物的奶制成。

en: I usually take a shower in the evening.
zh: 我通常在晚上洗澡。

en: He spent the evening reading a book.
zh: 他整个晚上都在看书。

en: You have been thinking about this problem the whole morning. Take a break; go eat lunch.
zh: 你整个上午都在思考这个问题。休息一下，去吃午饭吧。

en: Good night. Sweet dreams.
zh: 晚安。祝你做个好梦。

en: If you do not have this program, you can download it now.
zh: 如果你没有这个程序，你可以立即下载。

en: I'm running out of ideas.
zh: 我快没主意了。

en: The seven questions that an engineer has to ask himself are: who, what, when, where, why, how and how much.
zh: 工程师必须问自己的七个问题是：谁、什么、何时、何地、为什么、如何以及多少。

en: All I need to know about life, I learned from a snowman.
zh: 关于生活，我需要知道的一切，我都从一个雪人身上学到了。

en: Check that your username and password are written correctly.
zh: 检查你的用户名和密码是否正确。

en: Don't forget about us!
zh: 别忘了我们！

en: Which is your luggage?
zh: 哪个是你的行李？

en: There are also nightclubs where you dance flamenco.
zh: 也有一些夜总会可以跳弗拉明戈舞。

en: Who painted this painting?
zh: 谁画了这幅画？

en: At this hour, there is incredible traffic.
zh: 在这个时间，交通非常拥堵。

en: The tap is running.
zh: 水龙头开着。

en: I am four months pregnant.
zh: 我怀孕四个月了。

en: Can I pay by credit card?
zh: 我可以用信用卡支付吗？

en: I feed my cat every morning and every evening.
zh: 我每天早上和晚上都喂我的猫。

en: I need your advice.
zh: 我需要你的建议。

en: Any chance you know where I put my keys?
zh: 你有没有可能知道我把钥匙放在哪里了？

en: Take good care of yourself.
zh: 好好照顾自己。

en: The second half of a man's life is made up of nothing but the habits he has acquired during the first half.
zh: 男人后半生的生活，不过是在前半生养成的习惯而已。

en: Churches are designated on the map with crosses.
zh: 教堂在地图上用十字架标记。

en: The church is surrounded by woods and lakes.
zh: 教堂被树林和湖泊环绕。

en: The church is between my house and yours.
zh: 教堂在我家和你家之间。

en: The church is decorated with flowers for the wedding.
zh: 教堂装饰着鲜花，准备举办婚礼。

en: The church is at the foot of the hill.
zh: 教堂位于山脚下。

en: The church stood alone on the hill.
zh: 教堂独自矗立在山顶上。

en: The church is just across the street.
zh: 教堂就在街对面。

en: The clock in the church tower struck nine.
zh: 教堂塔楼上的钟敲了九下。

en: The church bell used to ring at three.
zh: 教堂的钟过去常常在三点钟敲响。

en: All the church bells started ringing together.
zh: 所有的教堂钟一起响了起来。

en: The church clock gains three minutes a week.
zh: 教堂的钟每周快三分钟。

en: The church congregation was moved by the fine sermon.
zh: 教堂的会众被精彩的布道所感动。

en: Let's pass by the church.
zh: 咱们从教堂旁边经过吧。

en: Go straight ahead until you reach the church.
zh: 一直往前走，直到你看到教堂。

en: Whoever goes to church believes in God.
zh: 凡是去教堂的人都信上帝。

en: There is usually an organ in a church.
zh: 教堂里通常有一台管风琴。

en: Rituals were performed in churches.
zh: 仪式在教堂里举行。

en: Churches were erected all over the island.
zh: 教堂在岛上各地建立起来。

en: You must not forget your schoolbooks.
zh: 你千万不要忘记你的课本。

en: Listen to me with your textbooks closed.
zh: 合上课本，听我说。

en: Where do we get the textbooks?
zh: 我们从哪里得到课本？

en: You must read the textbook closely.
zh: 你必须仔细阅读课本。

en: Each chapter in the textbook is followed by about a dozen comprehension questions.
zh: 课本的每一章后面都有大约十几个理解问题。

en: Open your texts to page 50.
zh: 把书翻到第50页。

en: The educational system is in transition.
zh: 教育系统正在转型。

en: We are looking forward to the holidays.
zh: 我们期待着假期。

en: Enjoy your holidays.
zh: 祝你假期愉快。

en: It will do you good to have a holiday.
zh: 休假对你有好处。

en: Did you enjoy your holiday?
zh: 你假期过得愉快吗？

en: She agreed with him about the holiday plan.
zh: 她同意他关于度假计划的看法。

en: I'm just sorting out some suitable clothes to take on holiday.
zh: 我正在整理一些适合度假穿的衣服。

en: I'd like to spend my holidays reading history books or classics.
zh: 我想用假期来读历史书或经典著作。

en: The holiday traffic crawled along the highway.
zh: 假日交通在高速公路上缓慢行驶。

en: If we would rest a little we would feel surely very much refreshed.
zh: 如果我们稍微休息一下，肯定会感觉精神焕发。

en: Take a rest.
zh: 休息一下。

en: The closing of school was due to the heavy snow.
zh: 学校停课是由于大雪。

en: He stayed there during the vacation.
zh: 他在那里度过了假期。

en: During the interval, Takashi and Harumi got a drink at the theater bar.
zh: 幕间休息时，隆和春美在剧院酒吧喝了一杯。

en: If you work too long without a rest, it begins to tell on you.
zh: 如果你工作时间太长而不休息，它就会开始影响你。

en: You have only a short rest, so make the best of it.
zh: 你只有短暂的休息时间，所以要好好利用。

en: Pretty soon we'd better wrap up this break and get back to work.
zh: 我们最好尽快结束休息，回去工作。

en: When is the intermission?
zh: 什么时候是中场休息时间？

en: Let's have some coffee during recess.
zh: 课间休息时我们喝点咖啡吧。

en: Shall we take a rest?
zh: 我们休息一下好吗？

en: Let's take a break for coffee.
zh: 我们休息一下喝杯咖啡吧。

en: I move that the meeting adjourn.
zh: 我提议休会。

en: What did you do on your vacation?
zh: 你假期做了什么？

en: I spent idle days during the vacation.
zh: 假期里我无所事事。

en: In the vacation, I read the entire works of Milton.
zh: 假期里，我读了弥尔顿的全部作品。

en: During the vacation my sister and I stayed at a small village at the foot of Mt. Fuji.
zh: 假期里，我和姐姐住在富士山脚下的一个小村庄。

en: You are in need of a holiday.
zh: 你需要一个假期。

en: You must go up the hill.
zh: 你必须上山。

en: You must form regular habits.
zh: 你必须养成有规律的习惯。

en: You broke the rule.
zh: 你违反了规则。

en: You must act in accordance with the rules.
zh: 你必须按照规则行事。

en: You should conform to the rules.
zh: 你应该遵守规则。

en: Did you inform your friends of your home-coming?
zh: 你有没有通知你的朋友们你回家的事情？

en: Clear up your desk a bit.
zh: 稍微整理一下你的桌子。

en: You had better make the most of your opportunities.
zh: 你最好充分利用你的机会。

en: You're stepping into dangerous territory.
zh: 你正在踏入危险的境地。

en: You must know you're faced with a crisis.
zh: 你必须知道你正面临一场危机。

en: You look pale.
zh: 你看上去脸色苍白。

en: You look pale. You had better lie down in bed at once.
zh: 你看上去脸色苍白。你最好立刻躺下休息。

en: You are as white as a sheet.
zh: 你脸色苍白如纸。

en: I think that you're wrong.
zh: 我认为你是错的。

en: Have you ever read any Chinese poems?
zh: 你读过中国的诗歌吗？

en: You've done a perfect job.
zh: 你做得非常完美。

en: You are nothing but a student.
zh: 你只不过是个学生。

en: You must not be absent from school.
zh: 你一定不能旷课。

en: You may be late for school.
zh: 你可能会上学迟到。

en: What subjects are you taking at school?
zh: 你在学校学什么科目？

en: He is, indeed, a man of his word.
zh: 他的确是个信守承诺的人。

en: Indeed you know a lot of things, but you're not good at teaching them.
zh: 你的确知道很多事情，但是你不擅长教导别人。

en: You seem to be prejudiced against ideas that come from foreign countries.
zh: 你似乎对来自外国的想法有偏见。

en: Would you like to go abroad?
zh: 你想出国吗？

en: You should have done it earlier. It cannot be helped now.
zh: 你应该早点做的，现在也没办法了。

en: What did you open it with?
zh: 你用什么打开的？

en: You shouldn't have done it.
zh: 你本不该那样做的。

en: You ought not to have done that.
zh: 你本不该那样做的。

en: You needn't do it at once.
zh: 你不必立刻做。

en: You must do it at once.
zh: 你必须立刻做。

en: When did you finish it?
zh: 你什么时候完成的？

en: You have to cope with those difficult problems.
zh: 你必须应付那些难题。

en: You're going about it in the wrong way.
zh: 你用错方法了。

en: Are you in favor of the workers getting more money?
zh: 你赞成工人涨工资吗？

en: You will not be able to catch the train.
zh: 你赶不上火车了。

en: Do you know the reason?
zh: 你知道原因吗？

en: You have to judge the case without bias.
zh: 你必须公正地判断这个案子。

en: Could you solve the problem?
zh: 你能解决这个问题吗？

en: You should have introduced yourself to the girl.
zh: 你应该向那个女孩自我介绍一下。

en: You must return the book to him.
zh: 你必须把书还给他。

en: You need not have bought the book.
zh: 你本不必买这本书的。

en: You may keep the book.
zh: 你可以保留这本书。

en: You will not be able to go through the book so quickly.
zh: 你不可能这么快看完这本书。

en: Are you for or against the bill?
zh: 你赞成还是反对这项法案？

en: You ought to know better at your age.
zh: 你这么大年纪应该懂事了。

en: You ought to have seen the exhibition.
zh: 你应该去看那个展览的。

en: Are you in favor of or against that policy?
zh: 你赞成还是反对那个政策？

en: You should apply for that post.
zh: 你应该申请那个职位。

en: Do you know where the girl lives?
zh: 你知道那个女孩住在哪里吗？
